abstract: Amtrak announces it will replace large departures board in Manhattan's Pennsylvania Station with smaller LCD screens spread throughout terminal, prompting mixed reactions from nostalgic and tech-forward commuters; hopes new system will alleviate congestion and aid disabled riders.

headline.print_headline: ‘A Piece of Penn Station’: An Exiting Departures Board Prompts Wistful Goodbyes
headline.main: ‘It Is a Piece of Penn Station’: An Exiting Departures Board Inspires Strong Emotions

keywords.value: Traffic and Parking Signals and Signs
keywords.name: subject

snippet: A sign announcing Amtrak and New Jersey Transit trains will be replaced by smaller LCD screens, upsetting those who view it with nostalgia but pleasing commuter advocates....
